channel.title: Comedy Death-Ray Radio
channel.description: Based on the live stage show the L.A. Times calls "one of the most prestigious nights of [comedy] in the country," Comedy Death-Ray Radio brings the country's best comedians straight to your home.
channel.itunes:summary: Comedy Death-Ray on Indie1031.com Fridays from noon - 1pm PST with Scott Aukerman, Rob Huebel and other comics from the Comedy Death-Ray...um...comedy show.
channel.itunes:author: Comedy Death-Ray Radio
